datafield.subfield: Software to preprocess the CMS 2011 DoubleMu and DoubleElectron datasets for the two-lepton/four-lepton analysis example of CMS open data.
Use this with the following datasets:
Software to produce the intermediate data files, derived from the primary datasets, for a simple analysis on Z decays to two leptons and ZZ decays to four leptons, of CMS open data.
Use this code with the CMS Open Data VM environment for 2011 open data
Only muon and electron collections are kept. This processing step is time-consuming.

The software produces the physics object in PAT candidate format. Only muon and electron PAT candidate collections are stored. No further selection, apart from accepting only the validated runs, is applied.
Only the list of validated runs for primary datasets of 2011 are accepted:
Two-lepton/four-lepton analysis example of CMS 2011 open data
Use this with the following datasets:
Example code for a simple analysis on Z decays to two leptons and ZZ decays to four leptons, of CMS open data.
Use this code with the CMS Open Data VM environment for 2011 open data
Running the job over all preprocessed datasets may take several hours.
The input files contain only the validated runs for primary datasets of 2011. For user validation of the analysis step, compare the result to the expected output file.
